name: Alexa
text: Average in all aspects. Not great for my purposes

name: John
text: Battery life is a little disappointing.

name: Hasan
text: Works quite well. Ears become sore after prolonged use. I dont think this is a fault of the brand more so of the over the ear design.

name: Mark
text: Returned first one as sound quality died at about 25 days. Returned for another. This time sound quality got horrible around the 65 day mark- too late to return for a refund.
